website_summaries.verdict: Though you get a wide variety and a lot of squishies for the price, the downside is more quality-control issues than others on our list.
pros: Numerous types of animals with smooth, easy-to-clean textures make up this large 16-piece set
"Squish" and rise as advertised – not too fast
cons: They are small, and some sets contain "deformed" squishies
Occasional reports of peeling paint, sticky residue, and an offensive odor

customer_reviews.title: Oh what fun these little squishies are
customer_reviews.text: Oh what fun these little squishies are! We needed a Valentine treat to share with my son's second grade class. We wanted something that was not candy, and also allergin friendly. We used a little double stick tape and stuck them right to the Valentine. We had fun picking out a unique animal for each classmate and even had a few left over to keep at home. I keep a couple in my purse for my kids to play with when we are on the go. Very cute and seem to be pretty durable- they are withstanding the inside of my "mom purse!"
customer_reviews.author: justandmama

customer_reviews.title: Super cute squishies!
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable! My kids are obsessed with little squishy toys. They like to buy the surprise ones but they absolutely loved these. I wasnt sure what to expect with these but am very surprised at the quality. They are soft and squishy and well made and cute! Definitely worth the buy. My kids have been playing with them for almost a week straight.
customer_reviews.author: aliciam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I ordered these thinking they would be like those foam squishies but I was absolutely shocked and amazed when I felt them. They almost feel like giant gummies and they are super squishy. They are really small and easy to just cary about and squish. I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for really soft and entertaining squishy things. Not to mention they are absolutely adorable and the paw shaped one is pretty accurate to the squishiness of a cat paw pad!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: I got these delightful squishy critters for my daughter who is obsessed with all things squishy atm. They are lots of fun to throw of sliding glass doors, or walls, placing bets to see which critter will meet it’s crumby demise first. And yes. All the crumbs stick to these little critters. HOWEVER, they make the most satisfying splat sounds when forcefully chucked on smooth countertops. Fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S.

customer_reviews.title: so cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: We love these; they're adorable and squishie. They're softer than play dough or silly putty but maintain their shape, like a very soft silicone. Just playing with them a few minutes I can tell they're not going to be very durable, likely they would easily be pulled apart if you stretched them too far, so just stick to squishing. My kids 5-14 each saw them and wanted one, so fun for the whole family. There is a very slightly sticky/moist or tacky feeling, but if that bothers you simply put a little baby powder on them. Now they also smell nice!
customer_reviews.author: sunbean72

customer_reviews.title: Squishy but smelly
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! They do come individually wrapped, but not in the bag pictured. They smell chemically and almost feel oily at times but are still very relaxing and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Martin

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, highly dissatisfied with product. Some came torn, many have painting mistakes, AND two are missing. The way they packaged them in hard plastic means many of them have sunken indents that do not appear to be coming out. If shipping it back wasn't a pain in my butt I would return these and get a better quality package
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Deformed and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The product came deformed. The paint on them is sloppy and cheap looking. I was going to use them as little rewards for my child but I can't even tell what some of them are.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I gave them to my class for valentines day. I could keep 8. So, me and my brother picked 4. We bought 2 of the squishy packs and my brother chose the Polar bear,Seal,Black cat, And Pikachu thing. I Named mine, White Fat Cat:Mochi Pig:Oinkie Pink Rabbit:Fufu Polar bear: Poo the Polar. Can get dirty easy but very easy to clean. Mine came a little "Melted". I think if you live close to seller, they won't be "melted" from the wrapping/Heat. In my experience, The polar bear is hard to keep clean, and bunnies eyes fall out witch you can fill in w/ sharpie
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Bean

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not durable
customer_reviews.text: You can play with theses Mini Squishies only one time, then the color will start to peel off and they will become so dirty that you can't event clean them under water. If you try to clean them under water more color will peel off. Just don't buy this. Cute but not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza120

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for Quality You Get
customer_reviews.text: I like them a lot but the painted designs rub off EASILY. Like, after a few rubs, the eyes and noses came off completely. If they were cheaper, I wouldn't mind that because I use them as positive reinforcement in my classroom. Kids are drawn to these things, it's amazing how quickly the negative behaviors disappear when I offer one as a reward. They also emit a greasy-type oil, so be weary. Don't let them get eaten or licked!
customer_reviews.author: Reece

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but not nearly as great as I hoped. I thought they would be bigger. They are not very well made. The paint on some of the eyes is sloppy and out of place. One came with a tear in the back. And they SMELL. SO. BAD. I really like they jelly feeling of them but I played with it for 5 minutes and it already has fuzz all over it. I will be returning these and getting a different squeeze toy. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KimmyZ

customer_reviews.title: Cute, You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: Been considering these for a while. The negative reviews scared me but I finally jumped the gun when they were on sale. I got all 16, they were packaged individually, I did get the little carrying bag. They’re not foam, they’re gummy - which I was expecting. The painted details on them are not great but not horrendous. Most have a few little creases where the plastic dug into them. They do leave an oily residue on stuff, but it’s rubbed away easily, not sure if it’ll stain. Overall I’m happy with my purchase. They’re squishy and fun and you get a lot of them for very little $.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and Squishy!
customer_reviews.text: The animals are really cute and are nice and squishy. The black eyes and little details will eventually come off with use, but that's expected. They are easily dirty, but are just as easy to clean. Literally just dip them in water and the dirt comes right off. they came inside plastic baggies, but i do not recommend keeping them in there, because it will leave wrinkles. They come with a little white pouch to put them in, but i keep mine in a small bag with polyester lining the inside so they don't collect dust when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetness

customer_reviews.title: Squishy little things.
customer_reviews.text: These tiny little things feel super squishy and kind of gross in my opinion, but my kid loves these things. She squishes them. She plays with them with her squinkies and other little toys. She carries them everywhere she goes...so basing on kid happiness I love them. They are very small, like 2" - 3" each. I think they kind of feel like old pudding, and not really like other squishies.
customer_reviews.author: Cappyaldu

customer_reviews.title: These are so cute!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So cute and fun!!! I keep mine in the plastic bags when I'm not playing with them and they stay perfectly soft and squishy! My kids who left theirs out of the packaging have gotten sticky and dirty. I read online that they can be rinsed in warm water and using flour or Baby powder pat them all over and they wont b sticky. We havent tried this yet though.
customer_reviews.author: Little Fawn loves~

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Squishy, and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when these arrived! They’re so cute and squishy. They stick together but they come apart without damage so it’s okay, it’s actually kinda cute! Their faces come off a little after time, but they’re still so soft and squishy. I’ve had them for almost 6 months now and they’re still in awesome condition. Make sure you don’t get any dirt or hair on them, though. It’s a pain to clean off!
customer_reviews.author: Tehya Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cute but collects dirt easily
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never bought these before but my niece really wanted them. I’ll start by saying that she absolutely love them when she opened her gift... But I had opened one prior to giving her them (and let my 5 year old have it) and although they are absolutely adorable they immediately collected dirt and grit.
customer_reviews.author: Amal

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet and cute, addicting to play with!
customer_reviews.text: These little guys are adorable! I ordered them to use in our shoeboxes that we send to children overseas with Operation Christmas Child. They are perfect because we can only fit so many things in the boxes and since these compress, they will easily fit! I know children will love them, I kept squeezing them myself and had to put them away, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B Racca

customer_reviews.title: Small and cheap
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yo thought these were cute enough but I wanted to throw them right in the garbage. They are so tiny, flimsy and cheap. I guess I should have had very low expectations given the price and where they were coming from. Not worth the purchase. Also, my 3 yo played with them for about 5 minutes and hasnt played with them since.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen A. Rissacher

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love these
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I don’t even know what these are. My 8 year old daughter wanted to buy them with her allowance. So I helped her do that. What’s most important to me is that my daughter is happy. These little characters make her very happy. So if you were to ask me, would you recommend this seller? They made my daughter happy!! So a resounding “Yes”. This is a great seller and I can recommend them emphatically.
customer_reviews.author: Andy De Vore

customer_reviews.title: Awful product- terrible quality :(
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE TERRIBLE. Within 2 minutes of playing with them the paint has completely come off their faces and the are beginning to tear.
customer_reviews.author: amiee saleh

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter ,and she loves them.You get a great variety, for a decent dollar amount.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Jiggly and fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are the Best! So fun to jiggle the little bellies of the animals. There are so many for the price too! I’ve seen these at our local toy store for 3x the price. It comes with a little drawstring bag to keep them in. I wouldn’t really call them a squishie, they feel more like jiggly jello.
customer_reviews.author: mbama

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, but sticky and wear down easily
customer_reviews.text: This are friggin adorable, and I love how much they squish. I don't love the texture. It's pretty rubbery and sticky -- it'll stick to crumbs or dust if you put it on a service with gunk on it. The eyes rub off very quickly. They get holes after a short while and get rips in the material. They're still enjoyable and good for stress relief, but I wish the material felt different.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Murchie-Beyma

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for these squishies when I got them they smelled as if they were scented of “oil diarrhea factory” lol. I did not get 16 I got 9😕 and they left my hands quite oily and smelly. I won’t buy mochi squishies again. Not like foam squishies, these are like rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney M Breen

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Not like normal squishies this are just sticky so they get super dirty almost immediately. Our package probably brought two color ones the rest are all white. I wouldn’t recommmend this if you are looking for squishies.
customer_reviews.author: Momofboys

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and squishy, but details wear off
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these things!!! They are adorable and super squishy and I just love squishing these little guys when I'm at my computer. Only reason I rated 3 stars is because the painted details on them wears off pretty quickly. It also says that if they get too dusty you can rinse them with water and that just seemed to make them super sticky and they now catch even more dust.
customer_reviews.author: Brittony

customer_reviews.title: Stress gone!
customer_reviews.text: I am in school to become an elementary special ed. teacher and I am always looking for ways to help kids stay in control of them selves. I've experimented with several "stress reliving toys" and this is the only one so far that has proven to work! They are quiet and a fun nervous energy transfer. It feels like squishing a large marshmallow without the sticky mess! The only down side is the painted details on the little creatures do come off when playing with them. Other than that I am completely happy with these little Squishies.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Walt

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not very good quality control
customer_reviews.text: These toys are squishy and cute but many are disfigured and warped. And the painting is not very consistent on them. Of the 16, I'd say at least 6 are mutated. But they do relieve some stress, just not very good quality control coming out of the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Came with missing piece
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about these mini mochi squishy toy. Except for one very disappointing thing. The baggie was torn and one piece is missing. Instead of 16 squishies, Amazon only sent me 15 and I took the picture demonstrating which piece was missing. Unfortunately I have an event in 1.5 days and need 16 squishies to distribute to 8 guests (2 per person). And now my original plan is ruined and I don’t have much time to return and buy another one. Good story to tell to my guests though! This is very unprofessional and disrespectful from the distribution center! Unfortunately there is no one star option.
customer_reviews.author: Ha Trinh

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and very squishy
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They're so squishy and the details don't crack either. Bonus: The cats look like they're doing sit-ups when you bend them haha. Only confusing thing is I have no idea what the thing that looks like a bunny but has pink tips and like 3 bumps on it's ears is.
customer_reviews.author: Erik H

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a hair/lint magnet
customer_reviews.text: Animals are VERY cute but have a slightly damp feel and pick up absolutely every bit of lint, dust, pet hair, etc. they touch. After rinsing them under running water to remove the hair a few times, the black markings are coming off. (We bought them for toddlers.) They might be better for someone old enough to keep them on a desk or shelf for decoration.
customer_reviews.author: VegCat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute cutest thing EVER! Of course my daughter wanted them. She instantly fell in love when they came! She even let me have one...she paid for them herself,lol. But I carry this cute little squishy thing around with me every day!!! When I've stressed out, I just break it out and go squishing it's little belly,ha ha ha!!! Works Everytime. Cause they are just so cute!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great for anxiety
customer_reviews.text: I bought this is squishies to use for therapy I gave them to my children clients who are struggling with anxiety this is a little toy they can take with them everywhere and it fits perfectly in their pocket the only thing is that after you are rocking them for a while eyes and mouth fade. They are about the size of 2 quarters.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Cute but some cons
customer_reviews.text: I like these little squishies, I used them to give to my classmates as a welcoming gift. Pros: Adorable Squishy Small and can fit in everything My classmates love them Cons: Smells like chemicals Paint rubs off after a day of playing with ( which isn't that bad for me because the ones I have with me I repainted just fine with acrylic paint ) I love it but if smell bothers you, maybe reconsider. But these are awesome and none of the cons really bother me, great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: super cute and squishy although some of the pieces had ...
customer_reviews.text: super cute and squishy although some of the pieces had faded faces. although not super terrible its definitely a chance you take. id say 90% of the pieces were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Angela locZi

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: They're cute, but they attract dust like no one's business. They also leave oil stains behind if you leave them in one spot for too long. Honestly, they were a impulse buy, so I didn't expect much. The packaging was eh. Now I just leave one on an apartment neighbors door if I leave a note with them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Luna

customer_reviews.title: Too small and Sticky
customer_reviews.text: these leave a residue on any surface they are left on which stains wood like oil stain. They are sticky and grab dirt from kids hands and it doesn't wash off the white little squishie animals. They are cute but dont recommend unless you are willing to keep them in Tupperware.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Fun knick-knack to play around for a while while.
customer_reviews.text: It was an impulse buy. It's fun and cute, but I found it difficult to keep it clean even with regular rinsing under the water. Fun object to play with for a short time, but not a lasting object to keep.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: These are super cute, my son picked them out for my ...
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, my son picked them out for my daughter for her Christmas present. They just came in plastic baggies so we bought a plastic case with little square compartments and my son put one squishy in each compartment and it looked really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Super Mom

customer_reviews.title: Greatest finger toys, ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved every thing about this item! My daughter is truly happy and occupied with her new finger toys. The description was totally accurate! I will repurchase this item to give out gifts to my grandchildren as well as collect more for my daughter! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Ericka Frye

customer_reviews.title: Cute and squishy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute squishy little guys. I gave some to friends as gifts and kept some for myself. They get sticky when you play with them which is a little weird but still very cute toys.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made for a cheap price
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the animals were squished so bad, they had the plastic bag markings on them and that won’t reverse itself. An ear from some were missing. Extra material was hanging off the animals so it looked very unprofessional. I had to trim the extra material off. It’s cheaply made for a cheap price, but they could have taken a little more pride in their work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trendy squishies that you squeeze for stress
customer_reviews.text: This year squishies are trendy stress relievers, and we all need them I guess. I put these in stockings for about 10 younger folk ages 10-18, and they loved them. I noticed their parents were squishing them as well.....
customer_reviews.author: BoxesEveryday

customer_reviews.title: Small and fragile
customer_reviews.text: Each little critter is smaller than I expected. Due to their size they look edible to a small child so I would not recommend for a child less than 5. They have good squish but are extremely fragile when stretched. They tear and break apart after a few minutes of stretching. It’s a good thing they’re cheap but they aren’t even worth the small price tag.
customer_reviews.author: CN JLM

customer_reviews.title: Very Sticky
customer_reviews.text: These are good for sticking on things and playing with, but they get dirty very easily and when you try to clean them they only get stickier and more dust sticks to them. coloring isn't very good, some missed spots and animals painted wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa Homola

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute Not Great For Squishing
customer_reviews.text: They're very cute when you first get them. The paint comes off very easy but thats normal. Comes with a very cute bag, I'm currently using the bag for my soft n slow rising squishies. I bought these to explore a little bit. I personally don't like how sticky they are, definitely aren't great for squishing in my opinion but they can definitely be used as decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Obama

customer_reviews.title: totally silly things... we don't need them, but they are cute and make fun gifts
customer_reviews.text: People complained about the smell... and they do smell toxic. I hand washed mine in liquid peppermint soap, rinsed well, let air dry. They smell fine, now, and are still delightfully squishy.
customer_reviews.author: LottieDah

customer_reviews.title: They get dirty easily
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I gave these to my daughters for Easter. They are slightly sticky and unfortunately they were filthy in a matter of days. I tried washing them, but they won’t come clean. They were super adorable and my kiddos loved them, but I feel like they were a total waste of money because now I have to throw them away after only one week.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: Stress relief for who???
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the Mochi Squishy as a party favor, thinking as it states, that this item is a stress squishy; giving relief like a stress ball but bringing a level of cuteness. Sooo, yes they are cute, however, stress relieving for who; because the only way you’ll relieve any stress with those is if you have the hands of a pre-mature baby. I wouldn’t purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: BHunt

customer_reviews.title: Not the best...
customer_reviews.text: The material was very sticky and they did not withstand a few hours with kids playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Baker

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: These were so cute the only thing I wish they would have stated that they were a gummy squishy not becomes sticky when played with.
customer_reviews.author: Cody storm

customer_reviews.title: massive disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my classroom for students to fidget with. They're cute, and students liked them at first, but the toys are dirt magnets and impossible to clean. The bag sits at the bottom of the box now, and nobody uses them, even when there are no more items to fidget with.
customer_reviews.author: Monteen

customer_reviews.title: It’s so SQUISHY!
customer_reviews.text: I love these squishies! The texture is amazing and it’s a nice fidget item. Downfall is that they do get dirty and attract hair and fuzz very easily, although they are super easy to clean. Mine did not come with the bag as advertised but I love them anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and cute
customer_reviews.text: Passed these out around my office, everyone loves them. If they get dirty from newspaper ink or peoples grimy fingers, using hand lotion mixed with hand sanitizer works well. I use some baby powder to get them feeling soft and not so sticky afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Del Buono

customer_reviews.title: Just not worth it
customer_reviews.text: These were very small and squished badly in the packages. So much so that they had a hard time recovering shape after taking out. The paint jobs for the eyes and mouths and such were not very good either.
customer_reviews.author: Janessa

customer_reviews.title: They are so cute and totally squishable!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I gave half of them as valentines to my girls' youth group and they loved them too. I kept a pig, a bunny, a pup, and two cats. They hang out at my office and charm everyone with their squishable marshmallow bodies!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bridgette Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute and squishy!
customer_reviews.text: They were what I expected and do the job for small trinkets for my employees as stress items. My kid loves the cats. Not a huge variety of colors in my batch, but it wasn't a big thing for me. Loved the cute pig.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Only got 8 instead of 12
customer_reviews.text: My initial response to them was that they looked great! On further inspection I realized there were only 8 squishies inside instead of the promised 12. There is also extra bits of rubber on some of them. Easy fix but still note worthy. The quality of the paint jobs are also blotchy but not a big deal to me personally. On a plus side they're super cute and squishable. Perfect for little fun gifts for friends and for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Soft, squishy and great for stress. I’m going to put one in Christmas Stockings. It’s great they are individually sealed too.
customer_reviews.author: MassShopper

customer_reviews.title: These are SUPER cute - much more attractive than the official brands
customer_reviews.text: These are SUPER cute - much more attractive than the official brands, and my nieces loved them. There were two where the ink/features were off - either smudged or in the wrong place, plus they are kind of oily/greasy. But neither of my nieces complain about those things.
customer_reviews.author: LoLo

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than they look
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. I wanted them for stress relief. Gifted them to kids at bus stop
customer_reviews.author: EPM

customer_reviews.title: Cute but pointless
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because it said they were like a stress ball. They really aren’t. They are very sticky. Anything and everything sticks to them. They are cute - but are kind of gross to actually handle.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: They are jiggly and feel very funny. Very cute animals though and good value for ...
customer_reviews.text: We thought these were slow-rise squishies, we didn't completely read the description. These are squishy alright....and a bit moist to the touch. They are jiggly and feel very funny. Very cute animals though and good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Speirs

customer_reviews.title: Too tiny.
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money, they are good quantity. But they get dirty very soon. Also the prints are mismatched on some of the squishies. I should have bought fewer but slightly bigger and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Jain

customer_reviews.title: Yucky
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, they are yucky and have a weird smell, i washed them a couple times and it’s not going away
customer_reviews.author: sofia

customer_reviews.title: Squishies, Squishies & more Squishies
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for the child next door. (she collects the squishies) and she was so excited to add these to her collection! I thought they were cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Smith

customer_reviews.title: cute, but only for a minute.
customer_reviews.text: these are so stinking cute, but quickly loses its satisfaction with how sticky they get. I'm not doing anything differently, it just gets so sticky. :/ Their faces rub off quickly as well.
customer_reviews.author: summer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely adorable. Bought for a 10 year old girl. Each one fits in the palm of your hand, incredibly soft and squishy. A great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Pan

customer_reviews.title: Great toys
customer_reviews.text: Kids are going to live these. Don’t breathe or peel or fade off great toys
customer_reviews.author: nicholas ward

customer_reviews.title: So squishyyy
customer_reviews.text: The last picture is so accurate of how squishy these are! I've been giving them to my coworkers in my office and everyone is just over the moon to have one. Good quality and extra squishy!
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Squishie-Feels good in hands
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little items that feel cool in hands-feels good on arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: I Sing!

customer_reviews.title: All of my granddaughter love these !!!!
customer_reviews.text: All my granddaughter love these ! Fit Perfect in Easter eggs !!
customer_reviews.author: F Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Use on glass surface
customer_reviews.text: Tiny soft squishy but will leech oil spots to any surface-fabric so be careful. Not sure what they put in them that makes this happen.
customer_reviews.author: Native Momma

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Received exactly the squishies shown in the picture. Good assortment. Good value. My kids love these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Co-workers gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave one of them to each of my people but just sad that they got ruined like a month later.... of course people squish it very hard lol haha
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Quintanilla

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my prize box for my 4th graders - they love them!
customer_reviews.author: Chilcote

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensory time
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4 year old son who has autism, he absolutely loves them and provides him with sensory input. They have been helpful with table work and to calm him down when his all over the place and needs time to just sit and relax. He goes through them rather quick so it’s great to have so many for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good assortment
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable. Got them for kids prizes and they just love them. Good assortment too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WHAT CUTE LITTLE FRIENDS FOR A CHILD.
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and very small. Before I wrapped them for Xmas, was squishing them to feel them. My grandson will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Eddards

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it.. for a little girl...I was her Santa this year.. her parents are having hard time and couldn't afford to get her anything...I made sure she got everything on her list
customer_reviews.author: Renee Gavlinski

customer_reviews.title: Fun squishies
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these little squishies and they are so cute. They are very fun to play with. They come indivisually wrapped in plastic with a small bag to put them in so they wont get dirty my two year old enjoys playing with these little things all day.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Creature Feature
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as appreciation tokens for our team. They have enjoyed them greatly. They're quite petite but very squishy, cute, and a great variety in creatures. ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Holley

customer_reviews.title: They collect dirt easily.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that one day, I was using one of the animals and it got very dirty, I even tried to wash it and it did not come clean. Otherwise, they are adorable stress relief toys. In my opinion, they have a great variety of animals.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bradley

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT BUY....
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! KIDS ABSOLUTELY LOVE THEM. I had ordered these to put in the girls valentines bags for my son at school for his valentines party. The girls loved them and even some of the boys wanted as well. I will absolutely be ordering many more for easter and other holidays for the kids. They were a lil small but so cute and soft, they really are just loveable.
customer_reviews.author: KStarks

customer_reviews.title: Meh.....
customer_reviews.text: The Squishies are not nearly as colorful as pictured. They are all pale and therefore not easy to tell apart. Each comes individually packaged in a reusable larger bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter for her birthday. Smaller then I expected but she was very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: David Cruickshank

customer_reviews.title: Super cute - soft
customer_reviews.text: Super cute - soft, jelly like consistency with quick bounce back. Surface texture is smooth and painted details are cleanly applied. A great deal for very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: shoppyshopperson

customer_reviews.title: Everything sticks to them
customer_reviews.text: These are cute, but they are super sticky and dirt, hair, etc sticks to them and they are constantly dirty and gross. I threw them all away after 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks? Left it on a piece of paper and it leaked into it.
customer_reviews.text: Some kind of liquid in it, Petroleum? I'm not sure what it is but I left this on a piece of paper and the paper absorbed the moisture from this thing and stained my document.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: All of them arrived in amazing shape with no deforms
customer_reviews.text: All of them arrived in amazing shape with no deforms. There was no evident factory smell and each of them were individually packaged. They are super squishy and adorable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Luu

customer_reviews.title: Kawaii
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and squishy. I shared some with my friends and my sister and they loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Made from the material that collects dust and dirt very easily. Mad cute and great party favors
customer_reviews.text: These squishies are the size of two quarters. They are more the squishies you find in the gumball machine. Not what I was looking for. Made from the material that collects dust and dirt very easily. Mad cute and great party favors, but definitely not a substitute for stress balls
customer_reviews.author: Donna Chau

customer_reviews.title: Great squishies for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My squishies came on time and were packaged securely! All 16 that are pictured are here. The pink ones (bunny, piggy, paw print) are slightly lighter than pictured. The blue and green ones are slightly lighter as well. The pastel colors fit nicely. The yellow ones are a bit more vibrant than pictured. None of them have any smudges or flaws. Overall, everything looks and feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: These are cute little squishies. Great for stress relief and small enough to keep in your purse.
customer_reviews.author: Heather McCue

customer_reviews.title: Cute for older kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute and I will order them again. They are not like slow rise squishys, feel different. I would recommend these for older kids or adults to use more as decoration. They are small and delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Dorilu

customer_reviews.title: sweet little gifts
customer_reviews.text: all kinds of cute little squishy animals and perfect to give to friends and family as gifts! they are also easy to wash if anything gets on them, once they dry theyre sticky again. only downside is the face decals can rub off easily
customer_reviews.author: Rinio

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and reasonably priced toys purchased for my great-nieces who ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and reasonably priced toys purchased for my great-nieces who are 9 years old. One or two had slight flaws (involving ink) but they were otherwise excellent.
customer_reviews.author: LD-R

customer_reviews.title: Squishy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little squishys !! They are individually wrapped and come in a drawstring bag. Used them as small gifts at a birthday party and kids had fun with them.. they pulled them, stretched them and squeezed them.
customer_reviews.author: HLeyva

product_meta.title: Mochi Animals Toys, Outee 16 Pcs Mochi Cat Stress Relief Toys Mochi Animals Toys Mini Animals Cat with Felt Bag
feature_bullets: PACKAGE INCLUDED - 16 pieces mochi animals toys with different styles including cat, rabbit, pig, seal, etc. Size about 5cm/1.9inch. Each toy has an individual package, it is very cute and small. Putting in your pocket and carry easily.

CUTE DESIGN - These stress relief toys come with cute design and vibrant color. The mini animals cats are amazing soft. You can't stop pinching them because of the great touch feeling. They can help to relieve stress and increase blood circulation of hands.

EASY TO CLEAN - These mochi animals toys are made of high quality TPR material, not easy to be out of shape. These mochi toys can be rinsed with water directly when they are dirty. Just put a little soap, the smudge will be wash off.

EDUCATION & ENTERTAINMENT - This mochi toys set is a perfect interactive toys for parents and kids. Parents can play mochi animals toys with children to train their logical thinking ability and spoken ability, cultivate kids creativity, imagination, patient and hands-on ability.

WIDE USAGE- These cute and adorable mini animals toys are perfect for reschool props, Christmas ornaments, Easter Egg fillers, birthday party favors, mini assortment for kids classroom rewards, goodie bag, carnival prizes and treasure box prizes. Enjoy funny game time with families and friends.
